CustomField.description: Enter the list of fields from the line item object displayed in the Option Hierarchy page. Each field API name may be separated either by a coma or by a new line.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter the list of fields from the line item object displayed in the Option Hierarchy page. Each field API name may be separated either by a coma or by a new line.
CustomField.label: Option Line Item Columns
